title: Solve for $$t$$ in the x(t) Equation
text: Solve for $$t$$ in the x(t) equation, we have $$t=\frac{1}{3} x+\frac{1}{3}$$

title: Substitute $$t$$ Into the y(t) Equation
text: Substitute $$t=\frac{1}{3} x+\frac{1}{3}$$ into the y(t) equation, we have $$y=2\left(\frac{1}{3} x+\frac{1}{3}\right)^2=\frac{2}{{9\left(x+1\right)}^2}$$
